findings.title: Owner privileges (In the period when the owner is not renounced)
findings.description: The contract owner has excessive privileges to perform various actions such as starting trading, including/excluding from rewards and fees, changing maximum transaction amounts, setting addresses, and modifying tax, liquidity, market, and dev fees.

findings.title: Potential unlimited trading
findings.description: The owner has privileges to change maximum transaction amount and set address to avoid this maximum, allowing potential unlimited trading.

findings.title: Unrestricted inclusion and exclusion from reward
findings.description: The owner has unrestricted privileges to include or exclude addresses from rewards.

findings.title: Unrestricted inclusion and exclusion from fee
findings.description: The owner has unrestricted privileges to include or exclude addresses from fees without any restrictions.

findings.title: Unlimited change of maximum transaction amount
findings.description: The owner can change the maximum transaction amount and set an address to avoid this maximum.

findings.title: Unlimited change of minimum number of tokens to sell
findings.description: The owner has unlimited privileges to change the minimum number of tokens to sell, which can lead to potential security risks.

findings.title: Unrestricted change of tax, liquidity, market and dev fee
findings.description: The owner has unrestricted privileges to change tax, liquidity, market, and dev fees without any limitations or restrictions.

findings.title: Unrestricted change of pancake router
findings.description: Owner has unrestricted privileges to change pancake router without any limitations or restrictions.

findings.title: Unrestricted change of fees and fee receivers addresses
findings.description: The owner has unrestricted privileges to change fees and fee receivers addresses without any restrictions or access controls.

findings.title: Unrestricted enable / disable swap and liquify
findings.description: The owner has unrestricted access to enable or disable swap and liquify functionality, which can lead to potential security risks.

findings.title: Unrestricted enable / disable reflection fee
findings.description: The owner has unrestricted access to enable or disable the reflection fee, which can lead to potential security issues.

findings.title: Unrestricted change of market and dev address
findings.description: The owner has unrestricted privileges to change the market and dev addresses without any limitations or restrictions.
